alert.note: Alert for Bakersfield; Buttonwillow - Lost Hills - I5; Delano-Wasco-Shafter; Fresno-Tulare Foothills; Hanford - Corcoran - Lemoore; South End San Joaquin Valley; South End Sierra Foothills; Southeast San Joaquin Valley; Visalia - Porterville - Reedley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 22 at 7:55PM PST until February 24 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 4 PM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Southeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph expected. * WHERE...The South end of the San Joaquin Valley including the Counties of Kings, Tulare and Kern. Also, for the Foothills of Tulare and Kern Counties. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 4 PM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
